emailcapture-desc:
{{desc|name=Email Capture|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:EmailCapture}}
The Email Capture extension will capture email addresses, and allow users to verify them through email.
emailcapture-response-body:
Body of an e-mail sent to a user.

Parameters:
* $1 – URL of the confirmation link
* $2 – URL to type in the confirmation code manually
* $3 – Confirmation code for the user to type in

The subject for this body is:
* {{msg-mw|emailcapture-response-subject}}
